characters.name: Kakeru Kurosawa
characters.description: Quiet and introverted, Kakeru keeps to himself - especially as he has a dark secret. Spending each afternoon in the girls bathroom masturbating, he loves being able to picture doing perverted things with females who wouldn't normally look at him twice. With much to learn about life, Kakeru finds that friendship and romance are much more important than painting the inside of a toilet stall.    Kurosawa spends time at the school library everyday, reading. He reads many books. He is also camera-shy and does not socialize with others, preferring to be a loner.

characters.name: Aya Kitahara
characters.description: A shy girl who is isolated from the class. She is being bullied by Sugawa. Later she discovers Kurosawa's secret and asks him an unexpected request.

characters.name: Maiko Sugawa
characters.description:
Bullies Aya Kitahara, smokes in the bathroom after school, and has a tsundere personality.  

 ~!She starts dating Kurosawa later on and they eventually marry.!~

characters.name: Keiji Nagatsuka
characters.description: Kurosawa's friend. He was the first person to socialize with him in school. He is an otaku.   ~!He later becomes Takigawa's boyfriend, which makes Kurosawa avoid him. After Kurosawa's confession and during the intense bullying he was enduring due to his confession, Keiji was the first classmate to start talking to him and help him through those tough times.!~

characters.name: Magister Takigawa
characters.description: One of the three "school idols" in Kurosawa's class who first comes across Kurosawa in the school library on a rainy day. She has a very energetic and accepting personality, easily becoming friends with Kurosawa, Kitahara, and the otaku of the class.  She plays a pivotal role in Kurosawa's development.

characters.name: Kyouko Naitou
characters.description: The schools number one idol and a classmate of Kurosawa. She works as a model for a popular magazine. She thinks of her self as a princess, often acts high-and-mighty. All of her best friends consist only of the pretty ones in class.

characters.name: Erika Nishimoto
characters.description: A classmate of Kurosawa and a member of the sports club, but she can't swim. She has good personality. Also she has been sitting next to Kurosawa since the 3rd semester of the 2nd year.

characters.name: Ayumi Harada
characters.description: Friend of Maiko Sugawa. Together, they relentlessly bully Aya Kitahara on a daily basis.

characters.name: Shuuta Seki
characters.description:
The fattest kid in the class, he is part of the otaku clique headed by Nagaoka.

~!At one point, Kitahara is bullied into falsely confessing her love to him and he later develops feelings for her.!~

characters.name: Nomiya
characters.description: The teacher of the class. ~!He commends Kurosawa for his courage to walk the "path of thorns" by confessing his crimes!~

characters.name: Ryuuta Kobayashi
characters.description: Sports-oriented. ~!He is later one of the first to openly accept Kurosawa after he confessed to his crimes!~
